snippet: The United Nations Human Rights Council has appointed three legal experts to an international commission to look into whether violations of international humanitarian and human rights law were committed during the conflict in Gaza.
abstract: United Nations Human Rights Council appoints three legal experts to international commission to look into whether violations of international humanitarian and human rights law were committed by Israel and Hamas during conflict in Gaza.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations Human Rights Council has appointed three legal experts to an international commission to look into whether violations of international humanitarian and human rights law were committed during the conflict in Gaza.

headline.main: Human Rights Council Plans to Investigate Gaza Conflict
headline.print_headline: Human Rights Council Plans to Investigate Gaza Conflict
